title: Number of Sears stores in the United States 2011 - 2017 , by type
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Full-line stores, and Specialty stores. The y axis denotes Number of stores and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Specialty stores is rapidly decreasing, Full-line stores is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
Specialty stores has decreased by 98.28101644245142 percent.
The lines ordered according to average values of Number of stores in descending order is: 1. Full-line stores, and lastly, 2. Specialty stores.
Overall across the Year, Full-line stores mostly maintained the highest Number of stores when compared to others with a mean value of 724.86, and it peaked at 2011.
The botommost line, Specialty stores,  has a mean of 220.71, and peaked at 2011.
